title: Keys to Preventing Future School Attacks
itunes:title: Keys to Preventing Future School Attacks
description:
Dr. Marisa Randazzo, Executive Director of Threat Management at Ontic, discusses the Uvalde, Texas school shooting and tactics for preventing future tragedies.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
